Goal Representation:
behavior sit_on_chair_and_touch_mouse(chair: item, mouse: item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, chair)
        # Sit on the chair
        achieve touch(mouse)
        # Touch the mouse

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind computer_417: item where:
            is_computer(computer_417)
        # Select the target computer
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close(chair, computer_417)
        # Select the chair close to the computer
        bind mouse: item where:
            is_mouse(mouse) and close(mouse, computer_417)
        # Select the mouse close to the computer
        sit_on_chair_and_touch_mouse(chair, mouse)
        # Sit on the chair and touch the mouse

behavior sit_on_chair_and_touch_mouse(chair:item, mouse:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, chair)
        achieve touch(mouse)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close_char(char, chair)
        bind mouse: item where:
            is_mouse(mouse) and close_char(char, mouse)
        sit_on_chair_and_touch_mouse(chair, mouse)

behavior sit_on_chair_and_touch_mouse(chair:item, mouse:item, computer:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, chair)
        # Sit on the chair which is in front of the computer
        
        achieve close_char(char, mouse)
        # Ensure the character is close to the mouse
        
        touch(mouse)
        # Touch the mouse

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind computer: item where:
            is_computer(computer)
        
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close(chair, computer)
        # Select chair that is close to computer

        bind mouse: item where:
            is_mouse(mouse) and close(mouse, computer)
        # Select mouse that is close to computer

        sit_on_chair_and_touch_mouse(chair, mouse, computer)

behavior sit_on_chair_and_touch_mouse(char: character, chair: item, mouse: item, computer: item):
    body:
        sit_somewhere(chair)
        achieve close_char(char, mouse)
        touch(mouse)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind computer: item where:
            is_computer(computer)
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close(chair, computer)
        bind mouse: item where:
            is_mouse(mouse) and close(mouse, computer)
        sit_on_chair_and_touch_mouse(char, chair, mouse, computer)
